value:
DOI Service
 
Based on an agreement between the MPDL and the German National Library of Science and Technology (TIB Hannover) Max Planck researchers can assign DOIs to their scientific output (research data and grey literature). This service is integrated into Edmond and Keeper but DOI assignment is also possible for items stored in local repositories.
 
 

 

Get more information about the MPDL DOI service

 

Get in touch with the DOI support team
